result.title: Session #13 â€” Introduction to Computational Geometry
result.content:
AlSalam Allaikum All,

During this session we have discussed an introduction to computation geometry, and how to map it to be implemented using the c++ built-in complex library.

Resources for this session exist through the following:

  • Coach Mohammad Kotb (mohammadkotb) Youtube Channel, you can check the first video here
  • The notes distributed during today's session, if you don't have a copy, you can view it here
  • TopCoder's article on Computational Geometry with Complex Numbers, by bmerry.

Problem set for the session will be available through a2oj contest here.
